# x, y, z

Max.   : 350   Max.   : 350 
```{r}
grid <- data.frame(expand.grid(
  x = seq(-350,350, by= 1),
  y = seq(-350,350, by= 1),
  z = seq(4,66, by= 1)
)
)
```
